title: Push notification token
description: Push notification tokens are used to communicate with applications that are installed on devices or SaaS application accounts. Examples include mobile application notifications over notification services like the Apple Push Notification service.

xdm:token.title: Token
xdm:token.description: The service specific token used to address the application for communication for example, an Apple APN ID or a Google GCM ID.

xdm:registrationDate.title: Registration date
xdm:registrationDate.description: Date and time when the profile has authorized the application to receive push notifications.

xdm:deregistrationDate.title: De-registration date
xdm:deregistrationDate.description: Date and time when the profile has disabled push notifications on the application.

xdm:environment.title: Environment
xdm:environment.description: Environment of at the time of the registration.

xdm:application.title: Application
xdm:application.description: Application registered to receive push notifications.

xdm:channel.title: Communication channel
xdm:channel.description: Channels for communicating with customers or users.
